category.name: Audit Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_audit_append_lov_display_value
preference.preference_description: Specifies if display value of LOV properties being audited be appended to its real value. Display value recorded on audit log will be in master locale. Valid values : true - Append display values of LOVs in master locale on audit log. false - Keeps original behavior of recording real value of LOV property being audited on audit log.
